issues.cause: Missing or invalid Google ID token
issues.solution: Ensure you're sending a valid Google ID token in the Authorization header
The server includes CORS headers, but ensure your origin is allowed

issues.cause: Invalid redirect URI or client configuration
issues.solution: Check Google OAuth client configuration and redirect URIs

issues.problem: MCP connection fails in Claude Desktop
issues.cause: Incorrect npx configuration or server not running
issues.solution: Verify the server is running on {{SERVER_HOST}} and npx mcp-remote is installed

issues.problem: Claude Desktop works first time but fails on subsequent launches
issues.cause: mcp-remote caches expired OAuth tokens and callback ports
issues.solution: Clear mcp-remote cache by deleting authentication files, or restart Claude Desktop completely. This is a known limitation of mcp-remote's authentication caching.

issues.problem: Vercel deployment fails on second mcp-remote connection
issues.cause: mcp-remote cannot resolve cached localhost callback URIs for remote servers
issues.solution: Use localhost development server (http://localhost:3000/api/mcp) for reliable mcp-remote connections. Vercel works for first-time auth but has caching issues on subsequent attempts.
